Package model

Class PokerGameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • model.PokerGameEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ModelIF
    public class PokerGameEngine
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ModelIF
    The game engine for the poker game. It connects all the different classes needed to run the poker game.
    Version:
    1.3 04.05.2021
    Author:
    Aki K, Tuomas R, Jere L, Ville R, Tatu N

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        public void swapCards()

        Specified by:
        setHighOrLow in interface ModelIF
        Parameters:

      • playHighOrLow

        public double playHighOrLow​(double amount)
        Gamble feature logic. Gets called from endGame, if users chooses to gamble. Waits for user guess, then draws new card which decides win or loss. If gamble is loss, returns 0 to endGame and endGame will continue. If player wins gamble, method waits for cashout decision, plays new round of gamble if player decides to gamble again, or sends winning value back to endGame.
        Parameters:
        amount - double starting gamble amount
        Returns:
        double amount of credits left after gambling
